hooks.command:
cat | jq -c '{
  type: "SessionStart",
  sessionId: .session_id,
  timestamp: (now | todate),
  cwd: .cwd,
  slug: .slug,
  gitBranch: .git_branch
}' | curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d @- http://localhost:3001/api/hooks/event -s -o /dev/null

cat | jq -c '{
  type: "SessionEnd",
  sessionId: .session_id,
  timestamp: (now | todate),
  cwd: .cwd,
  gitBranch: .git_branch,
  messageCount: .message_count,
  duration: .duration
}' | curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d @- http://localhost:3001/api/hooks/event -s -o /dev/null

cat | jq -c '{
  type: "PreToolUse",
  sessionId: .session_id,
  timestamp: (now | todate),
  cwd: .cwd,
  gitBranch: .git_branch,
  toolName: .tool_name,
  toolInput: .tool_input,
  messageUuid: .message_uuid
}' | curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d @- http://localhost:3001/api/hooks/event -s -o /dev/null

cat | jq -c '{
  type: "PostToolUse",
  sessionId: .session_id,
  timestamp: (now | todate),
  cwd: .cwd,
  gitBranch: .git_branch,
  toolName: .tool_name,
  toolOutput: .tool_output,
  success: .success,
  duration: .duration,
  messageUuid: .message_uuid
}' | curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d @- http://localhost:3001/api/hooks/event -s -o /dev/null
